snippet.title: The Elder Scrolls 3 - Morrowind (2002) PC 1st-person Fantasy RPG
snippet.description:
╔═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╗
►║|   *OPEN ME FOR MORE INFOS*   |║◄
╚═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╝

On this channel you will find tons of first person games as an archive for ALL first person games ever published is created here. The videos show you the first 15-30 minutes of gameplay without any comment, as I don't want to influence anyone with my opinion. If you like a game, I almost always have links in the info box where you can get the game (legal) without much searching. If you like the channel, you are welcome to leave me a subscription. THX

The Elder Scrolls 3 - Morrowind (2002) PC 1st-person Fantasy RPG

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Info:◄*

https://www.mobygames.com/game/6280/the-elder-scrolls-iii-morrowind/

https://ogdb.eu/index.php?section=title&titleid=881

https://www.igdb.com/games/the-elder-scrolls-iii-morrowind

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Engine:◄*

Gamebryo

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Other First Person Games from the developers "Bethesda":◄*

The Terminator (1991)
https://youtu.be/NnZLT0wcXNU

The Terminator 2029 (1992)
https://youtu.be/hnRCNssJyF4

The Terminator - Rampage (1993)
https://youtu.be/XkenmOvtL88

The Elder Scrolls - Arena (1994)
https://youtu.be/6hXGmRpNueA

The Terminator - Future Shock (1995)
https://youtu.be/411Ml3nP7x4

Daggerfall - Die Schriften der Weisen (1996) 
https://youtu.be/aD7s1lHxHg4 🇩🇪

The Terminator - SkyNET (1996)
https://youtu.be/usvYlmUoIxA

An Elder Scrolls Legend - Battlespire (1997)
https://youtu.be/JYgIlVhnDN4

The Elder Scrolls 3 - Morrowind (2002)
https://youtu.be/Kpj4pNUkZWQ 🇩🇪 
https://youtu.be/HQSsbS-Z4JQ 🇺🇸 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►The Hall:◄* --- German/Deutsch

https://www.youtube.com/@FPS.Games.Archiv/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=4

*►The Hall:◄* --- English

https://www.youtube.com/@FPS.Games.Archiv/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=3

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Long version:◄*
https://youtu.be/n_WYSM01ncA

*►Short version:◄*
https://youtu.be/HQSsbS-Z4JQ

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Gameplay:◄*

00:00 - Intro
00:03 - Intro & Main
02:04 - Gameplay - Check the info box for further details

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►You can get the game here:◄*

eBay Germany (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/FV1aGR

eBay U.S. (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/7LoQtU

G2A (Affiliate link):
https://www.g2a.com/r/gr-5e68d48b2d24e

GOG:
https://adtr.co/m5zkci

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/22320/The_Elder_Scrolls_III_Morrowind_Game_of_the_Year_Edition

Affiliate links: If you buy something through these links, I get a small commission without the price changing for you. This way you can support this channel if you want

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Hall Support:◄*

My Channel Supporter:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/join

Abo / Sub:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw?sub_confirmation=1

Do you have a Ko-fi for me?
https://ko-fi.com/hofpg

GOG (Affiliate link):
https://adtr.co/e96QGs

G2A (Affiliate link):
https://www.g2a.com/r/gr-5e68d48b2d24e

Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=19996679

TipeeeStream:
https://www.tipeeestream.com/hofpg/donation 

Twitter
https://twitter.com/hofpg
